rows.label: qst101401_msg0001
rows.name: I can't say that things are good.

rows.label: qst101401_msg0002
rows.name:
The pest researcher and the soldiers guarding them, who
went out to investigate the Volff, haven't returned,
even though they're past their scheduled return date.

rows.label: qst101401_msg0003
rows.name:
They were investigating countermeasures
because of the recent damage to
residents and Nopon merchants.

rows.label: qst101401_msg0004
rows.name:
Of the three soldiers I assigned, two
are Drivers... There shouldn't have been
any problem with their combat power.

rows.label: qst101401_msg0005
rows.name:
We're short-staffed as it
is, and two of our valuable
Drivers haven't returned.

rows.label: qst101401_msg0006
rows.name:
But they won't spare any personnel
for a search party, saying they want
to avoid a second disaster...

rows.label: qst101401_msg0007
rows.name:
It's a pathetic story, but
could I ask you to... Oh?

rows.label: qst101401_msg0008
rows.name: You have Blades too...! How reassuring!

rows.label: qst101401_msg0009
rows.name:
They were scheduled to investigate
near Varnax's Plunge, where there
are many Volff sightings.

rows.label: qst101401_msg0010
rows.name:
It's the large waterfall under
the Divine Beast's back.

rows.label: qst101401_msg0011
rows.name:
I pray for the safety of the four of
them and for your good fortune...

rows.label: qst101401_msg0101
rows.name:
The Volff investigation
party was scheduled to
head near Varnax's Plunge.

rows.label: qst101401_msg0102
rows.name:
I'm praying for the return
of the four of them...
